meanings.definition: A substance used to reduce friction between surfaces in contact with each other.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic applied lube to the gears to make them move smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use lube on the bike chain to prevent it from rusting.
meanings.sent3: The squeaky door was relieved when it received a dose of lube.
meanings.sent4: The relationship counselor acted as a lube, smoothing out the communication between the couple.
meanings.sent5: The skater glided effortlessly on the ice after applying lube to the blades.

meanings.definition: To apply lubricant to a surface to reduce friction.
meanings.sent1: She had to lube the hinges of the door to stop the annoying squeaking.
meanings.sent2: Remember to lube the bike chain regularly for a smoother ride.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to lube the pan before cooking the eggs to prevent sticking.
meanings.sent4: He decided to lube the conversation with a joke to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent5: The athlete quickly lube his shoes before the race to improve his speed.
